abstract: Three associates who had worked on the trial team representing Guy Hands, who sued Citigroup over the buyout of EMI, have been laid off.
snippet: Three associates who had worked on the trial team representing Guy Hands, who sued Citigroup over the buyout of EMI, have been laid off.
lead_paragraph: Three lawyers who until recently worked at Boies, Schiller & Flexner, the firm founded by the famed trial lawyer David Boies, have had a tough couple of weeks.
